developernameFlagDescription: The developer name of the dashboard to modify
dashboardtypeFlagDescription: The Dashboard running user type. Acceptable values are LoggedInUser, SpecifiedUser, and MyTeamUser
userwhereclauseFlagDescription: Where clause used to find the running user. Required if type is SpecifiedUser
runninguser.commandDescription: Modify the dashboard running user or view as option
errorDashboardNotFound: Did not find a dashboard with developername %s
errorUserNotFound: Did not find a user matching %s
errorBadDashboardType: Invalid dashboard type %s specified. Valid types are:  LoggedInUser, SpecifiedUser, and MyTeamUser
errorWhereClause: The option userwhereclause is required when type is SpecifiedUser
